text: Nathan McCree with his classic flute/harp comboÔªø for theÔªø Tomb Raider themes. I thought this game was a step down from the first twoÔªø in the series, and I know some people felt a bit of a franchise fatigue back then (due to yearly releases). I tried playing the first games again but they aged quite terribly. I thought Anniversary was a good remake of the first one, I wish they'd give 2&3 the same treatment. The new Tomb Raider looks quite good, but the magic seems to have been lost.
